# Copilot Chat Prompt Index

This file contains a list of all the prompts available to Copilot Chat.
Each prompt is listed with its name and a brief description.

## "cc.code.refactor"

**Description:** "Structured workflow for planning, implementing, validating, and communicating incremental refactoring work"

**File:** `cc.code.refactor.prompt.md`

---

## "cc.delivery.dep_upgrades"

**Description:** "Operational prompt for agents executing scoped dependency upgrade initiatives"

**File:** `cc.delivery.dep_upgrades.prompt.md`

---
